description: As a MERN Fellow at Bytewise, Created a fully functional cart management system using the MERN stack, enabling users to add, update, and remove items, with real-time updates and seamless user experience. Built a social media application clone, implementing features such as user authentication, post creation and liking. Leveraged MongoDB for data storage and React for dynamic user interface components. Developed a goal-setting application that allows users to create, track, and manage personal goals.

As a Full Stack Developer at Pakistan Post, Revamped Pakistan Post website using React, improving user experience. Optimized MySQL database, enhancing data management efficiency. Integrated Order Tracking System API, enabling real-time tracking on website.
